channel.title: Reproducible CTD in bm_c1a4c
channel.description:
Hit the switch and then run up the ladder before the fan starts moving and then wait on a physics object such as a skid. The game will crash to desktop when the fans are about to make you fly into the air. It must have to do with the physics of the pallet wanting to stay on the ground.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100181539[/url]
